name: Rogue Planet Consolidation Demo
description:
DISCLAIMER: DEMO ONLY HAS FIRST FOUR LEVELS, GAME IS IN EARLY ACCESS AND WILL BE UPDATED WITH MORE DURING THE COURSE OF 2023.

This is Rogue Planet: Consolidation

A standalone expansion to the original game, set 2 years after the original. The climactic finale and final chapter of the first game.

Story Mode:

Now that you've awoken from the events of the original, you return to the places you once explored in your dreams to find answers. Taking a job to repair a radar array leads to the place of origin to everything, as the truth of what happened in Santa Fe 2 years ago is finally beginning to unravel. Your interpetation of the truth will affect the world around you, and more importantly, the people living in it.

Be careful. Imaginations can be powerful things...

Do you think you can bring yourself to find the real truth one last time?

No choice without a consequence, no consequence without a step taken. 

With every step you take, there is a price to pay.

How far will you go to save yourself?

Features:

-Many Remakes and Reworks of existing levels

-Branching Paths and Multiple Endings

-New Guns and Enemies

-Upgraded and Remastered Graphics and Lighting

-Now running on the 64-bit GameGuru October 2022 Build for better performance

-Remastered Audio and Music

-Restored Content from the Original Release

-Tons of bug fixes

-Improved Enemy AI

-Objective System

-And much more!
